applications.description: ACTRES presents a series of generators designed to assist researchers and professionals in the composition of scientific and technical texts in English. These generators support the user throughout the composition process by offering the most appropriate suggestions where grammar is concerned.This is achieved by means of a user-friendly, productivity-driven interface.
applications.name: Technical and Professional Writing 2.0
applications.author: ACTRES

applications.name: Technical and Professional Writing 1.0
applications.description: ACTRES presents a series of generators designed to assist researchers and professionals in the composition of scientific and technical texts in English. These generators support the user throughout the composition process by offering the most appropriate suggestions where grammar is concerned.This is achieved by means of a user-friendly, productivity-driven interface.
applications.author: ACTRES

applications.name: Dictionary aids
applications.description: Diccionario terminológico y fraseológico español/inglés de fichas de cata.
applications.author: ACTRES

applications.name: PETRA 1.0: Translation Quality assessment
applications.description:
Petra 1.0 is a semiautomatic application designed to assess the grammatical quality of general English translations into Spanish, both fiction and non-fiction.

It is a user-friendly application with a highly intuitive interface. The grammatical assessment that it provides is based on the analysis of a number of grammatical units called ‘anchors’ (Rabadán 2008, 2010, 2011)
applications.author: ACTRES

applications.description: ACTRES presenta una serie de generadores con el fin de ayudar a los investigadores y profesionales en la elaboración de textos cientifico-técnicos en idioma Inglés. Estos generadores se caracterizan por asistir al profesional en cada momento de la redacción con las sugerencias más adecuadas en cada momento desde el punto de vista gramatical. Todo ello, a través de una interfaz de usuario amigable y enfocada a la productividad.
applications.name: Generadores para escritura 2.0
applications.author: ACTRES

applications.name: PETRA 1.0: Evaluación de la calidad de las traducciones
applications.description:
Se trata de una aplicación diseñada para evaluar la calidad gramatical de las traducciones del inglés al español de textos “de lengua general”: artículos de revistas y periódicos, ensayo, narrativa, etc.

Se presenta como un interfaz altamente intuitivo y totalmente centrado en el usuario que funciona gracias a información lingüística experta basada en anchors: unidades morfológicas o combinaciones sintácticas que bien:
applications.author: ACTRES
